author: mcmurma
content: I like it, especially the color treatment. The lensbaby is so handy in its application (you have tilt, shift, swing, and rise in your pocket... don't get that from just any lensðŸ™‚ that I have deliberated about buying one for some time. I have a more cumbersome setup to do these things with a dslr, but its not very simple to setup or use in the field.
